created_at.description: Timestamp when the vote was created

item_id.description: Identifier of the item that was voted on

item_type.description: Type of the item that was voted on (e.g., ticket, article)

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the vote was last updated

url.description: URL of the resource related to the vote

user_id.description: Unique identifier of the user who voted

value.description: Value of the vote (e.g., upvote, downvote)
